Very minimalistic and cheap for an all inclusive 6.60 Euro menu of a pasta dish, bread and dessert or espresso.  Pasta to me wasn't as good as a place in the same hood down the street Pasta Fresca, but both have good salads.  Star to me was the desserts, dulce con leche, cheesecake and tiramisu.  Beats all tourist spots and expensive prices.  Fresh Real Food is their motto!  Empanadas de Argentina as well!  Big ones!  Friend adored rich cheese ravioli.  I thought pasta was a little overcooked.
